title: Chanseok Kang
text: I’m Research Engineer in LG Electronics. My role is to deploy energy-efficient algorithm in commercial/business product(refrigerator, washing machine, HVAC etc). Also, I have an experience on developing BSP drivers on 5G environment. I’m very interested in learning something new(AI, Embedded System, Mathematics). Especially, I enjoyed taking MOOC (Massive Open Online Course) when I have free time.

title: Chanseok Kang
text:
Education
Seoul National University | Seoul, South Korea M.S in Electrical Engineering and Computer Science | Mar 2012 - Feb 2015
Chung-Ang University | Seoul, South Korea B.S in Electrical and Electronic Engineering | Mar 2006 - Feb 2012
